name: One Second To Midnight
description:
A game about a president's servant. You have to deliver boxes on time or somthing bad will happen...

If you won't deliver all the boxes on time and the clock runs out the doomsday will happen. Doomsday clock is an actual clock and it is currently at about 100 seconds to midnight. Don't let that clock get to midnight or the doomsday will happen.

There is no way to win this game, so show me you best survival time before the doomsday.

Good Luck!

Controls: WASD or Arrow keys
